page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area surrounding{Ewyas Harold}is {rural}and most of the land is{farmland but farming is certainly not the main type of employment. Many people living in the area work in Hereford or other places 10 miles or more away, using the{A465,}Hereford to Abergavenny road link. About half of the working people in the area work locally but are not involved in farming. Some of these work on the small{industrial estate}at {Pontrilas}or at Pontrilas Sawmills or at Herbert Collins and Sons who make farm buildings, trailers and equipment, as well as selling cars and preparing rally and racing cars. A number of people also work at the{SAS {camp}which is on the eastern edge of the area.
